I've been a long-time fan of Gladiator (had it since it game out in
'92), but ever since getting a new Windows box after an old 486 with
MS-DOS, I couldn't get the scenario editor to work.  How joyful was I
when I found Gladiator still alive on the 'net, and even more happy to
see that it's been released under the GPL (as OpenGlad).  But oh woe,
to my utter despair, scen-edit STILL gives the same error!  THAT WAS
WHY I LIKED GLADIATOR SO MUCH!  I like creating levels; you should've
seen me on ZZT.  I was limited by a tiny hard drive on my old
computer; I'd love to use it on a 160GB one.  I could make BILLIONS of
maps!  But why won't the scenario editor work!?  WHAT FORCES CONSPIRE
TO KILL MY FUN!!?  I'm okay.. I'm okay.. *sniff*

Here's the error message:
http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v81/ericmelech/opengladerror.png
